column4: excuse me... I am kinda new to linux. but I am brand new to ubuntu and I am trying to install ati drivers, I have just installed the drivers and rebooted so I desided to try glxgears to see if it worked and I got this in return
] Xlib:  extension "GLX" missing on display ":0.0".
glxgears: Error: couldn't get an RGB, Double-buffered visual.
was that as root?
that's why it didn't work.
I tryed it as non root as well...
oh.. what are you trying to do? you don't have direct rendering on an ATI card using the proprietary drivers?
I am trying to install ati drivers and I wanted to check by runing glxgears
try 'glxinfo | grep direct'
no need to msg me ;) just give me the output of the command i gave you above.
'glxinfo | grep direct'
not 'glxgears'
sorry glxgears was the top line but then I ran glxinfo... but I didn't put it together
pastebin isn't working right now... and I forgot the other site. so is it ok if I wisper spam you?
sure.. though back in 2 minutes. it's likely i can help here.
I sent it to you.
hmm didn't get it. can you msg it to me line by line?
yes, msg me the output of glxinfo | grep direct
line by line (avoid flooding)
msg me for assistance getting hardware accelleration for your ATI
manage to sort out your fglrx?
!!!!!! yay your on... I needed your help for so long then one person finly helped me... I reinstalled ubuntu.
you reinstalled??? youch! how come?

could you join #flying-penguin I want to ask you a few qustions... but since I am doing so much stuff it will take meh a wile to type it all... and it would be all broken up on this channle. this way you can read it once I am done.
